TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewHeaderRowPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GridViewRowPresenterBase

summary.span: 代表用來定義欄標題列版面配置的物件。

span.span: Represents an object that is used to define the layout of a row of column headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這物件和物件是支援的物件，如顯示資料的資料行中的模式。This object and objects are support objects for the mode that displays data in columns for a . 如需有關如何定義檢視，請參閱[GridView 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md)。For more information about how to define a view, see the [GridView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md). 您可以判斷資料行移至新位置藉由監視時所定義的事件。You can determine when a column is moving to a new location by monitoring the event that is defined for the . 您可以自訂中的資料行標頭檢視模式中使用的各種相關類別和此類別中找到的屬性。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 如需有關這些屬性，以及它們之間的優先順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資料行是否能變更位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether columns can change positions.

value.span: 如果可透過資料行行首的拖放作業來移動資料列，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if columns can be moved by the drag-and-drop operation of a column header; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您實作這個類別的一部分檢視模式中，這個屬性的值會繫結的值至屬性。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定複合字串，這個字串會指定如何格式化顯示為字串的資料行行首。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或屬性設定，則會忽略這個屬性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 您可以使用數個屬性來指定資料行標頭的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果設定多個屬性，具有最高優先權的屬性值以格式化資料行標頭。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以數種類型上設定資料行的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 下列清單顯示的屬性可以用來格式化資料行標頭，從最低到最高優先順序排序：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您實作這個類別的一部分檢視模式中，這個屬性的值會繫結的值至屬性。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 如果屬性和同時設定屬性，優先。If the property and the property are both set, the takes precedence. 您可以自訂中的資料行標頭檢視模式中使用的各種相關類別和此類別中找到的屬性。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 如需有關這些屬性，以及它們之間的優先順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnLostMouseCapture(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnLostMouseCapture (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供 之 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事件發生時，資料行移動到新位置時，會取消此移動。If a event occurs while a column is moving to a new position, the move is canceled. 這項實作無法處理事件。This implementation does not handle the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供使用者在 內按下滑鼠左鍵時發生之 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user presses the left mouse button inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，這個方法會準備要拖曳出來，放到另一個位置中的資料行的標頭資料列的資料行。If is `true`, this method prepares a column to be dragged to another location in the column header row. 此實作會處理藉由設定事件事件引數`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonUp(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonUp (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供使用者在放開滑鼠左鍵時發生之 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user releases the left mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，而且如果移動的資料行，資料行拖曳至新位置之後，就會發生事件。If is `true`, and if the event occurs after a column is dragged to a new location, the column is moved. 此實作會處理藉由設定事件事件引數`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseMove(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseMove (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供使用者移動滑鼠時發生之 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user moves the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`且使用者按下滑鼠左的按鈕，這個方法會實作發生於使用者拖曳視覺行為到新位置。If the property is set to `true` and the user presses the left mouse button, this method implements the visual behavior that occurs when the user drags a to a new location. 這個方法會覆寫設定事件引數`true`如即使使用者未按下滑鼠左的按鈕的事件。This method override sets the event argument to `true` for the event even if the user does not press the left mouse button.
